reviews.review: Much smaller player base than CS:GO but IMO more fun and appealing to the original Counter Strike. You can't beat that.

This game is good.

I am bad.

3
-
10

This game is stupid! The accuracy is so low, you can't even hit anything that's in front of you. The grenade will not aim at what you are looking at if you move at all. The players are too op and will often kill you in 1 hit, where you can't shoot at their heads, which is an instant kill. You have people with huge ammounts of health even though you shot them a billion times. I only came here for textures for gmod, but decide to play it. It's the same weapon over, and over, and over again. Somtimes the weapons you have, they have, and there weapons are more deadly then yours. Also it is very confusing which is the enemy, and which is your teammate, which can often make you shoot them, and give your position away. If you die, you have to wait until the next round to respawn, which can take forever. The only good thing is the ai, they are the best thing I seen besides Alien Isolation's ai.

Don't play this game if you don't want op people, same weapons, poor accuracy, confusing characters, and more terrible things.

Amazing game with the community servers, as of now I am an admin on a server. I don't get bored of this game no matter how old it is. People keep making more content and being creative in their own ways, resulting in awesome game modes.

I love CSS I started playing it really late because always I was mostly CS 1.6 which I started playing since I was 7 and like after couple of years when I was 11 I stopped playing because I got bored with it and I had PSP where I played many other games such as FIFA , NBA2K... But then when I heard that CS:GO came out I got back on PC games in 2014 and I am still playing CS:GO in 2018 nowadays and I remember when I was watching the store, I saw the game called Counter Strike Source and I had to try it. I played it over 2 years now, played cracked version because I did not want to give 20 euros on it on steam but when It was on sale I had to buy it and I did not regret. I like it and It is great to play it once in a while when you are tired of games such as PUBG and CS:GO.
BEST COUNTER-STRIKE EVER MADE. SURELY RECOMMEND. :)

for 20$ not worth its more like a 5$ game with its playerbase and Counter Strike Global Offensive being waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay much better. Make it cheaper then it will be worth the buy for the poor people.
